name: Red Tag Rendezvous
description:
This is a short and sweet dress up game about picking the right outfit to impress your date!

Features:
- Cute lil' art style
-16 Different clothing items to choose from
- 5 randomly selected dates
-1 Sweet tune

Game by Marlowe Dobbe
Music by Ryan Whyman

Made over the course of 12 days as part of the June 2021 PIGSquad Summer Slow Jam,
